column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Went expecting greatness but got mediocre. Malnati's salad was great
column2: but the deep dish did nothing special for me. I've had better in Iowa City believe it or not. Not busy when we went
column3: but it took the server about 12 minutes to greet us
column4: then another 12 for beer. Only six or so tables sat at the time. Seemed like they are living on reputation and not trying that hard.
